name: Surprise Eggs Factory
description:
Let's play amazing beautiful game. There are 100+ different toys in the toys library. It's full enjoyment game.

How to play?
=========
- Drag the coins in the vending machine. Then you get one egg.
- Tap to open the egg and you get surprise toys.

Features:
=======
- 100+ toys library.
- Easy to play.
- Supported IOS11.

Surprise eggs are awesome, you never know what’s in that little chocolate egg! It’s always a surprise what’s in the chocolate egg, did you ever got a egg with a surprise in it what you don’t like? I bet you liked all your little toys you found inside of it!
